channel.title: Looking for some staff/help
channel.description:
I have a source from years ago when i use to host and play with my friends and such but now I want to bring it back and fix the problems make it public It's old name from back in the day was solid scape not sure if I want to stay with that or not but it is an 06 source of some kind the ip is up and running when I left the house this morning. Solidscape.no-ip.biz you are more than welcome to try and connect and check it out for some reason some clients crash as soon as logged in not sure why ? But anyway it is currently setup like normal runescape people/shops Xp rate I don't want to go into a big jumbled up mess ... I would like to bump up the dp at least x2 .... For right now I have a dedicated server at my house 10meg Internet I can allow team view etc just looking for some old school lovers that want to start up something real and good :)
Sry for no pics I am on my iPad at work I can post some this evening
My Skype is goldengun1201 message me if you are interested

item.title: Looking for some staff/help
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You’ve already posted a thread in the development teams section, which is the best fit for a post such as this.
Good luck with development.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some staff/help
item.dc:creator: @Behill1201 Behill1201
item.description:
@Behill1201 wrote:

I am currently looking into a few but I don’t want to get the new rs style are there any newer server sources that still have the 07-06 feel?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some staff/help
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

The quality of hosted servers has increased since then. You may want to consider just downloading a new source.

Read full topic
